definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Zinc metal reacts with hydrochloric acid to produce bubbles of hydrogen gas and zinc chloride.
sentences.chinese: 金屬鋅與鹽酸反應產生氫氣泡和氯化鋅。

sentences.english: Some carbons are activated or washed with phosphoric acid, zinc chloride, or potassium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 一些碳被激活或磷酸，氯化鋅或氫氧化鉀，洗淨。

sentences.english: Therefore, basic zinc chloride could be a good supplemental source of Zn in the diet.
sentences.chinese: 因此，鹼式氯化鋅在日糧中是一種好的鋅源添加劑。
